long_description: Every ounce counts on light and fast trips in the mountains. Keep the weight of your pack to a minimum with the Esbit Titanium folding stove. Titanium stove weighs only 0.4 oz. and folds down to 1.1 x 3.3 in., so you'll barely notice it in your backpack. Stove is powered by Esbit solid fuel tablets (sold separately); tablets generate up to 1,400degF of intense heat and burn for about 12 min. each. Each fuel tablet weighs 0.5 oz. Esbit Titanium folding stove Includes a mesh storage bag.
short_description: Every ounce counts on light and fast trips in the mountains. Keep the weight of your pack to a minimum with the Esbit Titanium folding stove.
